title: Radiation Nation - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 12/9/20
itunes:title: Radiation Nation - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 12/9/20
description:
George Noory and EMF expert Daniel DeBaun explore his research into health risks posed by 5G and other new cell phone technology, how it can disrupt sleep, and what kind of damage it could have on children who constantly use cell phones daily.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
